info.title: Colombo Relay ITS API
info.description: API for managing ITS passes and related information for Colombo Relay.

post.description: Logs in a user with email and password, returns a JWT token.
Returns details of the currently authenticated user.
Invalidates the current user's JWT token.
Refreshes an expired JWT token, returns a new token.

get.summary: Get all Mumineen records or a specific one
get.description: Returns all Mumineen records if no ITS ID is provided. If an encrypted ITS ID is provided in the query, it returns the specific record. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: its_id
parameters.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the Mumineen to retrieve (optional).

post.description: Stores a new Mumineen record. The 'its_id' is expected to be encrypted. Requires authentication.

requestBody.description: Mumineen data object. `its_id` must be unique.

its_id.description: Encrypted ITS ID. Must be unique.

hof_id.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the Head of Family.

get.description: Returns a specific Mumineen record by their encrypted ITS ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: its_id
parameters.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the Mumineen to retrieve.

put.description: Updates a specific Mumineen record by their encrypted ITS ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: its_id
parameters.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the Mumineen to update.

hof_id.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the Head of Family.

delete.description: Deletes a specific Mumineen record by their encrypted ITS ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: its_id
parameters.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the Mumineen to delete.

get.summary: Get all family members by ITS ID
get.description: Finds the Head of Family (HOF) for the given member (by their encrypted ITS ID) and returns all members of that family. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: its_id
parameters.description: Encrypted ITS ID of a family member.

404.description: Mumineen not found or no HOF ITS ID available

example.message: Mumineen not found or no HOF ITS ID available

get.summary: Get pass availability summary for an event
get.description: Returns a summary of pass availability, including Vaaz centers and their blocks, for a specific event.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the event to get summary for

vaaz_center_issued_passes.description: Number of passes issued for the Vaaz Center

block_issued_passes.description: Number of passes issued for the Block

event_id: The event id field is required.

get.summary: Get a specific pass preference by ITS ID
get.description: Returns a single pass preference if an ITS ID is provided. The user must be authorized to view the preference for the given ITS ID. Listing all preferences is restricted and will return an empty array.

parameters.name: its_id
parameters.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the mumineen to retrieve a specific pass preference. If not provided, returns an empty array.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a single PassPreference object or an empty array.

403.description: Forbidden. User is not authorized to view this preference.

example.message: You are not authorized to view this pass preference.

404.description: Pass Preference not found for the given ITS ID

example.message: Pass Preference not found for this ITS number

put.summary: Update one or more existing pass preferences
put.description: Updates one or more existing pass preference records in a single transaction. Each object in the array must contain an 'its_id' to identify the record.

requestBody.description: An array of pass preference data objects to update.

its_id.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the mumineen whose preference is to be updated.

404.description: Pass Preference not found for one or more records

example.message: Pass Preference not found for ITS: 12345678.

403.description: Forbidden. User is not authorized to update a preference for one or more ITS numbers.

example.message: Authorization failed for one or more ITS numbers.

422.description: Validation error or business logic error

example.message: Error for ITS 12345678: The selected block is full.

post.summary: Create one or more new pass preferences
post.description: Creates one or more new pass preference records in a single transaction. The ITS ID is expected to be encrypted.

requestBody.description: An array of pass preference objects to create.

its_id.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the mumineen. Must be unique.

403.description: Forbidden. User is not authorized to create a preference for one or more ITS numbers.

example.message: Authorization failed for one or more ITS numbers.

422.description: Validation error or business logic error (e.g., capacity full, incorrect associations)

example.message: The selected block is full for ITS 12345

delete.description: Deletes a pass preference record identified by its ITS ID. The ITS ID in the body is expected to be encrypted.

requestBody.description: ITS ID of the pass preference to delete.

its_id.description: Encrypted ITS ID of the mumineen whose preference is to be deleted.

example.message: You are not authorized to delete this pass preference.
Pass Preference not found for the given ITS number.

its_id: The its id field is required.

get.description: Returns a list of all available pass types defined in the PassType enum.

tags.name: Pass Preferences
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing Pass Preferences
